text: You can see in this image when Facebook turned off the cross-posting API. It's a screen shot of "Radio3" -- the tool I use for linkblogging. It's amazing this has gotten almost no coverage in the press. It's like a tunnel under the Hudson was terminated, where FB is New Jersey and everything else is Manhattan (or vice versa, it doesn't matter). Only this TechCrunch story. Update: And a story on ProgrammableWeb.
